title: What is the Chaipi cancellation policy?

options.description: Our Cancellation policy depends on your oreder status:

options.title: CANCELLING BEFORE SHOP ACCEPTS ORDER:
options.description: -If you cancel before the shop accepts the order, you'll receive a full refund

options.title: CANCELLING AFTER SHOP ACCEPTS ORDER:
options.description: -If you cancel after the shop accepts the order, you'll receive a partial refund

options.title: CANCELLING BEFORE DELIVERY PARTNER PICKS UP ORDER:
options.description: -If you cancel before the delivery partner picks up the order, you'll receive a partial refund
